segments.text: I notice the open window above the sink, it's letting in a lot of light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful and well-maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the path and the low bushes, they're neatly trimmed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm garden and the chaotic kitchen is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of tranquility looking at the garden, it's so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window panes are divided into small squares, it's a classic design.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman might enjoy gardening, given how nice the garden looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight is streaming in, illuminating the kitchen and highlighting the water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit envious of the peaceful garden scene, it's so inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains are tied back, allowing maximum light to enter.
segments.speaker: PAR
